subject: Hockey, Ice
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Concussions
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for ex-players who have accused the N.H.L. of hiding the dangers of head trauma and promoting violence have a judge’s permission to proceed with discovery.
snippet: Lawyers for ex-players who have accused the N.H.L. of hiding the dangers of head trauma and promoting violence have a judge’s permission to proceed with discovery.
